snippet.title: Wargame: European Escalation - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Get it on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/58610/
More info on : http://www.wargame-ee.com/

War begins now! Wargame: European Escalation, the explosive real-time strategy game developed by Eugen Systems (R.U.S.E.™, Act of War), celebrates today its worldwide release on PC in retail stores and for download with its launch trailer!

Thanks to this impressive one minute and a half video, fully realized with gameplay sequences, players can live the last hours before the terrible war that is about to begin in the heart of Europe on the 23rd of February.
Intense sequences carry the ever increasing tension that rages on the continent. Military installations across Europe are set in a state of maximum alert, air bases of Ramstein and Allstedt have begun to deploy they squadrons, and columns of tanks on both sides of the frontier are moving toward the Iron Curtain that will become, in a few hours, the frontline of a war which will tear apart Europe.

With war about to begin, the armies of the 8 nations under the banners of NATO and the Warsaw Pact are getting ready for battle. All they need now is for you to take command!
